about_the_game:
Original Survivors Victorian Chest
It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a player in possession of Don’t Starve, must be in want of posh Victorian-themed skins. Bedeck your Don’t Starve Together characters with fashion befitting the Victorian Era with the Original Survivors Victorian Chest!

Includes
  • Wilson's Victorian Skin Set
  • Willow's Victorian Skin Set
  • Wolfgang's Victorian Skin Set
  • Wendy's Victorian Skin Set
  • WX-78’s Victorian Skin Set
  • Wickerbottom's Victorian Skin Set
  • Woodie’s Victorian Skin Set
  • Wes' Victorian Skin Set
  • Maxwell's Victorian Skin Set
  • Wigfrid's Victorian Skin Set
  • Webber's Victorian Skin Set
  • Winona's Victorian Skin Set

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This Victorian Chest contains the original Victorian series. Contains skins for: Maxwell, Webber, Wendy, Wes, Wickerbottom, Wigfrid, Willow, Wilson, Winona, Wolfgang, Woodie, and WX-78.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
